key_mistakes.reason: Allowed opponent to gain significant advantage by not addressing threats.
Gave away control and material advantage to the opponent.
Lost material by misplacing the knight.
Allowed opponent's pawn structure to strengthen.
Poor piece positioning leading to further loss of control.

themes: Loss of material due to tactical errors
recommendations: Focus on controlling the center in the opening.
Ensure pieces are developed to active squares.
Avoid unnecessary pawn moves that weaken the structure.
Calculate tactical sequences carefully to avoid material loss.
